feed.title: Google Cloud: Text-to-Speech
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Text-to-Speech

entry.content: Chirp 3: Instant Custom Voice now extends support to ja-JP, now supporting more than 30 locales. For more information, check the [Chirp 3: Instant Custom Voice documentation](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/chirp3-instant-custom-voice).
entry.summary: Instant Custom Voice now supports ja-JP, expanding its reach to over 30 locales.
entry.title: Changed: Instant Custom Voice now supports Japanese
